Paragraph: The FDA - recommended dose during PCI is 25 microg / kg / min ( 350 microg / kg initial bolus ) , adjusted to achieve activated clotting times ( ACTs ) of 300 - 450 sec .

| Disease |
| --- |
| PCI (Percutaneous Coronary Intervention) |

The paragraph is not explicitly mentioning any specific disease, but it is discussing a medical procedure called PCI (Percutaneous Coronary Intervention), which is used to treat cardiovascular conditions such as coronary artery disease or angina.
